reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful with amazing sequins for the season, and appreciate its good quality, stretchiness, and value for money.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning Dress
items.body: Bought this dress for a Christmas formal and it was absolutely stunning. The color and sequins were amazing for the season and the quality was perfect. I spent hundreds on other proms and this dress was better quality and much cheaper! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT STRETCH
items.body: ORDER YOUR SIZE VERY NICE FIT..GOOD STRETCH...IM TALL SO I COULD HAVE WEBT UP A SIZE FOR LENGHT...BUT VERY NICE LOOKS JUST LIKE PICTURE Read more
items.author: Joyce Lotts Harris

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price
items.body: Dress was too big but was nicely made Read more
items.author: Deborah

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Wish it worked out
items.body: Dress is cute and stretches the length was long but great with heels unfortunately they sent a 2XL when I ORDERED an XL and it was too big to wear I could of probably fit in L honestly Read more
items.author: marie wallace

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Elegant dress, but not for tall women
items.body: Beautiful color. No chemical smell Great value for money Sturdy material that is not too thin Not for tall girls. Read more
items.author: MizAnn

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Dress, Stretchy, Sewn in bra too small
items.body: 5'10" tall, 170 lbs, 38D ordered large, and it fit well, but it does have an underwire sewn in & the "cups" weren't large enough. Thankfully it has stretch to it & with the sequin (and low lighting event), the "too small cup" wasn't noticeable. Has a back zipper. Overall, it was a beautiful dress for the price & I got lots of compliments, but would have preferred no underwire. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glamorous color
items.body: Love the gown what a perfect fit and the design was true to the picture on line. Read more
items.author: Emily

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved the dress
items.body: Loved this dress. I am 5'7" and got a size small. It fit beautifully on me and I got so many compliments. And the material was very good quality and warm. Read more
items.author: Kianna

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi V Neck Evening Sleeveless Formal Mermaid is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi V Neck Evening Sleeveless Formal Mermaid is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Green Gold, Red, Gold, White, Blue, Purple, Black Silver, Black, Green Arc Gold, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
